title: Hello World
content:
Welcome to NoBo!

This is my first post in NoBo, a Next.js static site platform that works like a CMS but stores all content in JSON files.

NoBo combines the power of Next.js with the simplicity of file-based content management. All your posts, themes, and plugins are stored in the content/ folder as JSON files.

Updated: This post has been modified to test the caching system!

Key Features

  • Static site generation with Next.js
  • Gutenberg block editor for content creation
  • File-based content storage
  • Plugin and theme system
  • Admin dashboard for content management
  • Intelligent build caching for faster rebuilds

NoBo makes it easy to create beautiful static sites with a familiar CMS-like experience.
